data.name: Starblazer Demo
data.detailed_description:
Starblazer is designed to be a virtual space arena, where players can engage in real-time strategic aerial battles. It captures the strategic advantage of virtual reality better than any competitive game before, taking advantage of real-time virtual space to manipulate and engage your fleets.

In this Demo, the player has Demo Room fully unlocked, allowing them to test out new ideas and strategies in the safety of a demonstrable space. Learn about each ship type, play around and discover new ways to beat your opponent. In the Training Room, you can practice in mock battles.

In the full version, the user can customize their own fleet and then battle an aggressive AI in the War Room on full-sized maps.

Space is a large frontier waiting for you to launch into the void and conquer. Build your fleet and join the war for the stars!

data.short_description: Starblazer is an immersive space strategy VR game, pitting players against each other in real-time aerial battles. Build up your fleet, devise a winning strategy, and conquer the galaxy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
